TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Operators extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供后期绑定的数学运算符，例如 Visual Basic 编译器在内部使用的 和 。

span.span: Provides late-bound math operators, such as and , which the Visual Basic compiler uses internally.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类支持 Visual Basic 编译器，不应在代码中直接使用。This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

span.span: Performs binary or text string comparison when given two strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类支持 Visual Basic 编译器，不应在代码中直接使用。This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 当 Visual Basic 相等运算符用于比较两个字符串时，它会将这两个字符串以及 自变量的 `False` 值传递到 `TextCompare` 方法。When the Visual Basic equality operator is used to compare two strings, it passes the strings to the method along with a value of `False` for the `TextCompare` argument. 这执行区分大小写的比较，序号或基于当前区域性，具体取决于语句的值。This performs a case-sensitive comparison that is either ordinal or based on the current culture, depending on the value of the statement.

public: static System::Object ^ XorObject(System::Object ^ Left, System::Object ^ Right);
static member XorObject : obj * obj -> obj

param.name: Left
param.span: 任何 或数值表达式。

param.name: Right
param.span: 任何 或数值表达式。

summary.span: 表示 Visual Basic 运算符。

returns.span: 一个 值或数值。
对于 比较，返回值是两个 值的逻辑异运算（互斥逻辑析取）的结果。

span.span: For a comparison, the return value is the logical exclusion (exclusive logical disjunction) of two values.

returns.span: 对于按位（数值）运算，返回值是表示两个数值位模式的按位异运算（互斥按位析取）结果的数值。

span.span: For bitwise (numeric) operations, the return value is a numeric value that represents the bitwise exclusion (exclusive bitwise disjunction) of two numeric bit patterns.

returns.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 Xor 运算符。

span.span: For more information, see Xor Operator.
